body.name: MAWODE Bluetooth Speakers, T10 Waterproof Speaker, 8 Hr Playtime Portable Speaker, Small, Lightweight, Mini, Wireless, Shower Speaker, Aux & TF Card Support (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 40 mins
features: High quality sound: The MAWODE T10 Bluetooth speaker delivers high quality sound with deep bass and clear treble. It is perfect for listening to music, watching movies, or playing games.

Portable and lightweight: The MAWODE T10 speakers bluetooth wireless is small bluetooth speaker and lightweight, making it easy to take with you on the go. It is perfect for picnics, camping, or any other outdoor activity.
Long battery life: The MAWODE T10 shower speaker has a long battery life of up to 8 hours, so you can enjoy your music all day long.

IPX5 waterproof rating: The MAWODE T10 portable bluetooth speakers is waterproof and dustproof, making it perfect for use in any environment, whether you're at the beach, in the pool, or in the shower.
Aux and TF card support: The MAWODE T10 waterproof bluetooth speaker supports aux and TF card input, so you can play music from a variety of sources.
TWS stereo pairing: The MAWODE T10 wireless speakers with bluetooth supports TWS stereo pairing, so you can connect two speakers together to create a stereo soundscape.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High-quality sound: The MAWODE T10 delivers high-quality sound with deep bass and clear treble. It is perfect for listening to music, watching movies, or playing games.Durable and waterproof: The MAWODE T10 is made of durable materials and is IPX5 waterproof, so you can take it with you wherever you go. It is perfect for use at the beach, pool, or in the shower.Long battery life: The MAWODE T10 has a built-in battery that provides up to 8 hours of playtime. This means that you can enjoy your music all day long without having to worry about recharging.Easy to use: The MAWODE T10 is easy to use and has a simple, intuitive interface. You can connect it to your phone or other devices with just a few taps.Affordable: The MAWODE T10 is an affordable option for a high-quality Bluetooth speaker. It is perfect for anyone who is looking for a great value.

TWS Connection Turn On 2 speakers, Not Connect with Bluetooth Device, Double Click "+", Then Connect with Bluetooth Device Enjoy Stereo Music. Please Noted: 1: Different Chip Speaker Cannot Paired. 2: We sell only One speaker in package, not Two!!!

Portable Only 0.35 LBSSize: 2.6 x 2.6 x 3.78 inches Energy Conservation 8 Hours Playtime on 2/3 Volume Depend by Music Style Easy To Use Connect Via Bluetooth to Your iPhone, Smartphone, Tablet or LaptopPlay from Your PC and Non-Bluetooth Devices Using 3.5mm Audio Cable Connected to AUX-IN JackInsert TF Card Directly Play Music, Support WMA, MP3 Format
Easy to Carry Out for Hiking ONLY 0.35 Pounds, Easy to Carry Out with A Lanyard( We not sell with product). Hiking, Bike, Climb... All Can Use It to Enjoy Music.

Caution If You Not Find the Bluetooth Name "T10" First time, Pls Repeat Refresh Bluetooth List Until You Find the Bluetooth Name.The Speaker Not Have Phone Call Function.We Only Provide AUX Cable and Type-C Charge Cable, No Charge Adaptor In Box, You Can Use Phone Charge Adaptor Or Other USB Charge Adaptor.If You Met Speaker Cannot Power Off, Press Turn on Button 16 Seconds to Reset Speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible battery, great sound, easy to transport
reviews.reviewText: This little speaker has a ton of bang for your buck! Whether you're at the beach, camping, kayaking, or just hanging around the house, this speaker produces clear, loud sound. The strap makes it convenient for tying it onto a backpack, beach chair, kayak, etc. It fits in the palm of your hand and is lightweight, making it the perfect on-the-go companion.If you're a music lover, you need this speaker!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel speaker
reviews.reviewText: I take this with me and enjoy music wherever I go. It works perfectly and the volume is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loud enough for personal use
reviews.reviewText: This speaker is a good value. It is not as loud as more expensive speakers of the same dimensions, but at this price it is more than loud enough for personal use. I've used it outside in the rain, confirming it is at least splash-proof. At less-than-full volume the sound quality is decent. At full volume it can distort a bit, but again at this price it is fine. Its style compares well with more expensive speakers. The card-reader and stereo-pairing are nice plusses but I have not yet used those features. If you're looking for a small speaker to bring on a peaceful walk or a bit of low-key study background away from home, this is a fine device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for about a year and no complaints.Please understand what this item is before buying it. - The output is not that high nor that great.But, I work 10 hours days M-T and sometimes 10 F/6 S. - I do not have this turned up to full volume, around 70-80%. - The battery has lasted me all day, everyday so far (maybe a got a unicorn). - It provides enough sound for me to enjoy the music and not disturb fellow employees. - The bluetooth probably works better than any other device I tried using - I have plenty of issues with turning devices on and 'auto-sync'ing'. - This has worked everytime.Some possible cons: - It will not compete with employees with "good" (expensive) speakers. - It will not compete with loud machinery. - The battery will likely not last as long at 100% volume. - I have not tried the water-resistant / proof claims.The performance has been a pleasant surprise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a no brainer.
reviews.reviewText: You will be amazed with the sound quality.well built quality. I may buy anotherone they can be paired up for stereo sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product has a soft fabric/rubber outside and the sound is really great for the price! It keeps a charge for a shift at work and is small enough to easily slip into a cup holder for car trips!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad sound quality
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to use with an old mp3 player just around the house. But the sound is horrible. You get screechy static if whatever you have it hook to is turned up above 10 but if you turn the actual speaker up it's the same thing so it only plays well at a fairly low volume. So if your sitting right by it it would probably be fine otherwise your going to struggle to hear it well. I gave it 3 stars because the battery does seem to last fairly well.UPDATEToday I used this on and off throughout the day it's worse than I thought every time I turned it back on I had to reconnect and I'm not even talking about the Bluetooth function I literally have to unplug and re plug the AUX cable it's ridiculous. Horrible sound and a pain to use. I stupidly threw away the box so now I can't return the junk. Don't waste your time or money.UPDATE #2I finally tried the Bluetooth option I used it on my phone first and it worked OK. It actually connected immediately no problem at all but it would cut out every little bit. Then I tried it with my lap top and I could not get it to connect at all. So the Bluetooth function doesn't work very well either. I got this speaker because it got good reviews so I don't know maybe I got a dud. Still wouldn't recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very loud
reviews.reviewText: This speaker is small, but not mighty.
